"This one is a schlippery one. Already got away from me once
"Fool me once... They all underestimate me these days..."
"If you find more potential ss-schubjects for my experiments,
"What kind of experiments are you doing here?"
"There is no reason for more cruelty..."
"How long have you been down here?"
"I am investigating the boundariesch of human resilience..."
"My mission is to torment the flesch of these poor schouls
and find hidden secrets within their physique."
"A mission? Who gave you this mission?"
"Mission, goal, any last straw in finding meaning in this
rotten existence... Isch all figure of speech..."
"My methodss... They seem cruel and hideous, yesch..."
"But I didn't choose thissch... line of profession. It
"Pain and schuffering... It is all I know anymore..."
"It is my purpose in this wicked world."

Map053.Event[178].Page[1].list.message[0: "Huh? You are with a sane mind still?"
Map053.Event[178].Page[1].list.message[1: "Please leave me. I'm not here to make acquaintances and
I fail to see what worth chatting with you would bring..."
Map053.Event[178].Page[1].list.message[4: The dark priest seems clearly frustrated by you.
Map053.Event[178].Page[1].list.message[5: "My name is Enki. A priest of destruction."
Map053.Event[178].Page[1].list.message[7: "What does it look like? I can see how a brute like
yourself wouldn't understand the meaning of libraries..."
Map053.Event[178].Page[2].list.message[0: "Listen I am through with this conversation. It brings no
Map053.Event[178].Page[2].list.message[2: The dark priest doesn't seem to want your company at
moment. It might not be a good idea to bother him.
Map053.Event[178].Page[3].list.message[1: "You just keep on talking to me in hopes of gaining even
a smallest advantage in this darkness, do you?"
Map053.Event[178].Page[3].list.message[2: "Dark priests are generally frowned upon in the supressed
modern societies, but then we suddenly become a valuable
asset when you're facing eternal darkness."
Map053.Event[178].Page[3].list.message[3: "Well your survival is none of my concern."
Map053.Event[178].Page[3].list.message[4: "In fact, you would most likely be more valuable to me, after
the horrors of these dungeons have had their way with you."
Map053.Event[178].Page[6].list.message[2: The stone is radiating faint blue light.
Map053.Event[178].Page[6].list.message[5: No reaction. But it is satisfying.
